sourcesContent:
PROJECTS

Feb 2023 - Sep 2023
FARMS MANAGEMENT PLATFORM

Developed a web application dedicated to an agricultural consulting office. The main objectives are to improve customer management, centralize relevant information and optimize consultation processes.

Technologies : Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL, Postman
Nov 2022 - Dec 2022
DESKTOP MINI GAME APPLICATION

Designed and implemented a desktop application for a minigame that challenges players to decipher words from a set of letters.

Technologies : Java SE, MySQL
Sep 2021 - Dec 2021
ONLINE RECRUITMENT WEB APPLICATION

Crafted a candidate-centric platform, simplifying the job application process for seamless access to relevant opportunities.

Technologies : HTML, CSS, JS, J2EE, MySQL
Feb 2021 - Jul 2021
MOBILE AND DESKTOP APPLICATIONS FOR DIGITIZING UNIVERSITY RESTAURANT TICKET

Developed a comprehensive solution comprising both a mobile application for students to enable them to reserve tickets for university restaurants and a desktop application for restaurant employees to efficiently manage student entries.

Technologies: Java SE, React Native, Node.js, MySQL, Postman
❮ ❯
